title: Perma Ban LOL
body:
Game 1
To ARU TouMa: wow
To ARU TouMa: reported kayle is immortasl
To ARU TouMa: shaco
To ARU TouMa: what about gank..
To ARU TouMa: u str8 dont stop ran away from me
To ARU TouMa: useless mf
To ARU TouMa: god adc u have 0 mecanic and always outposition
To ARU TouMa: he ult me
To ARU TouMa: LOL
To ARU TouMa: wtf
To ARU TouMa: is that
To ARU TouMa: lol i can kill u even 1v3 kayle run run
To ARU TouMa: pyut box.é..
To ARU TouMa: this adc
To ARU TouMa: omg
To ARU TouMa: noob team
To ARU TouMa: report mf plz
To ARU TouMa: it took them 11 second to kill me
To ARU TouMa: u havent move as usual..
To ARU TouMa: im done
To ARU TouMa: mf u call protec FUCKIKN NEVER HELP
To ARU TouMa: its over
To ARU TouMa: this adc refuse to win
To ARU TouMa: all objectif is open
To ARU TouMa: whaty u doing
To ARU TouMa: troll on the map doing noting
To ARU TouMa: as uysusal
To ARU TouMa: lol need 6 to kill me under 10 second?
To ARU TouMa: it was a joke -.-
To ARU TouMa: ...
To ARU TouMa: objective
To ARU TouMa: wtf
To ARU TouMa: this isnt a ultimate?
To ARU TouMa: he just did it 2 time in 20 sec
To ARU TouMa: gj mf
To ARU TouMa: still trllling in map
To ARU TouMa: at least im the reason wqhy we are winning scrub
To ARU TouMa: gg

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________

And that was the only game from the report XD i pictured it but anyways was only a silver account -.-'' just annoyed to have to lvl up another account -.-''

I havent insult anyone, (the noob team) was refering to all my team refuse to go on objective..

replies.body:
I see the problem. 

The problem is that you don't think this is toxic. I can tell you that it is. The only not toxic part of this chatlog was 'gg'. Literally every other part was toxic.

Realise this, and perhaps in the future you don't have to waste time leveling a new account, just so you can make someone on the internet feel bad.

> [{quoted}](name=To ARU TouMa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hn8iVTwd,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-07T19:15:26.140+0000)
>
> I havent insult anyone, (the noob team) was refering to all my team refuse to go on objective..

That... still counts as an insult.

> To ARU TouMa: useless mf

So does that. Even if she was really useless, all the automatic system is going to see is an insult.

Personally, I wouldn't have reported you for all that. But someone did report you, and you have enough negativity in all your complaining to be the straw that broke the camel's back. After a two week ban, any toxic chat can get you a permaban, and the system counts this as toxic.
Your whole log was toxic. You telling your teammates how bad you think they are playing does is toxic.

Its physically not possible to get perma banned just for the chat logs you provided (unless you edited them) but im assuming you have had bans before on this account.

Just start a new one, and look back at what you did.
